amendment.description: Amendment requires a report from the Secretary of Defense on appropriate steps that can be taken in response to foreign governments who initiate legal actions against current or former officials of the United States or members of the Armed Forces relating to the performance of their official duties.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 108-120 to add a new section requiring a report on actions that could be taken regarding countries that initiate certain legal actions against United States officials.
